billEvents.eventText: referred to tourism, arts and sports development

title: Establishes the Stony Brook state park as part of the state park preserve system
summary: Establishes the Stony Brook Harbor state park as part of the state park preserve system; such park shall include certain marsh islands in the Stony Brook Harbor.
lawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3938

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 31, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ENGLEBRIGHT -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Tourism, Parks, Arts and Sports Development

       AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law,  in
         relation to establishing the Stony Brook Harbor state park

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The parks, recreation  and  historic  preservation  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new section 20.05 to read as follows:
    3    S  20.05  STONY  BROOK  HARBOR  STATE  PARK. 1. THE COMMISSIONER SHALL
    4  DESIGNATE, PURSUANT TO THE REQUIREMENTS OF SECTION 20.02 OF  THIS  ARTI-
    5  CLE,  THOSE PARCELS OF LAND SPECIFIED IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS SECTION
    6  TO BE THE PART OF THE STATE PARK PRESERVE SYSTEM  TO  BE  KNOWN  AS  THE
    7  "STONY BROOK HARBOR STATE PARK".
    8    2.  THE STONY BROOK HARBOR STATE PARK SHALL CONSTITUTE THE STATE LANDS
    9  WITHIN THE STONY BROOK HARBOR  ESTUARY  INCLUDING  THE  SAND  AND  MARSH
   10  ISLANDS  OF  THE STONY BROOK HARBOR WHICH ARE EXPOSED ABOVE WATER DURING
   11  THE LOWEST POINT OF LOW TIDE AND AT LEAST PARTIALLY VEGETATED WITH SPAR-
   12  TINA ALTERIFLORA.
   13    3.  WHEN DESIGNATING THIS PRESERVE THE COMMISSIONER SHALL ALSO CONSID-
   14  ER FOR INCLUSION SUCH UPLAND AND PROPERTIES AS MAY BE  ACQUIRED  BY  THE
   15  STATE FOR PARK, OPEN SPACE OR PRESERVATION PURPOSES.
   16    4.  THE  EXACT  BOUNDARIES  OF  SUCH  PARK SHALL BE ESTABLISHED BY THE
   17  OFFICE, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE SECRETARY OF STATE.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07947-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing the Stony Brook Harbor state park
